articles.title: Dhoni will be banned if CSK bowlers don't buck up: Sehwag - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Former India opener Virender Sehwag feels Chennai Super Kings' bowlers are repeatedly letting MS Dhoni down and has urged them to "buck up" to avoid the risk of getting their talismanic skipper "banned".

articles.title: JioCinema May Be Rebranded to JioVoot, Subscription Plans Could Start at Rs 99 - MySmartPrice
articles.description: Reliance owned JioCinema could rebrand itself to JioVoot as per a report. It will have a plan called Super Plan that will start from Rs 99.
